briefTitle: Feasibility of Online MR-guided Radiotherapy on a 1.5T MR-Linac
officialTitle: Feasibility of Imaging and Radiotherapy on a Novel 1.5 T Hybrid Magnetic Resonance Imaging - Linear Accelerator System (MR-Linac)
conditions: Rectal Cancer, Head and Neck Cancer, Liver Cancer, Breast Cancer, Prostate Cancer, Oligometastasis, Esophageal Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Feasibility of online MR guided Radiotherapy
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* existing indication for radiation therapy
* minimum age 18 years, no upper age limit
* capacity for consent
* Informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:

* contraindication for MRI (claustrophobia, metallic implants not applicable for MRI
* pregnancy
